name: The Draw (codedAuthor)
description:
A game made by a group of three college students over the span of roughly two months. Welcome to "The Draw" - a game where myth meets the classic cards you think you know. 

As soon as you agree to play, you find yourself in a near-empty room. The only company you have is a table and two cards ahead of you. The "choice" is yours...which Patron will you be fighting in the honor of?

Soon after, your hand is dealt. The power is all in your hands (or is it?) to survive against an opposing god, who will try to stop you and aims to smite you for trespassing.

How did you get into this mess? Will you be able to get out? Only time will tell.

May the Fates be on your side.
